titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament. Die Lunæ 8. Septemb. 1645. Whereas the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled, are informed that by the subtile and malicious practises of a Popish and malignant party, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Wright at the Kings head in the old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Title from heading and first lines of text.
Disclaiming any intention of confiscating Welsh estates for the benefit of the Scotch.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings head in the old Bayley
